title: New: Sody – Sorry
body:
Digging the attitude on this debut single from fifteen year **Sody** (Sophie Dyson).

Hints of Tove Lo, Charli XCX and a less tediuous Ellie Goulding; it’s pretty ambitious and a killer first offering. Check out Sorry below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
